name: Compare Neural State Data Across Epochs

params.name: Cell Set File(s)
params.description: ISXD cell set file(s) containing neural activity data

params.name: Event Set File(s)
params.description: ISXD event set file(s) containing neural events data

params.name: Annotations File
params.description: Experiment annotations file with state and epoch information

params.name: Define Epochs By
params.description: Method to define epochs. If 'files', one epoch per input cell set will be automatically defined, for the whole duration of each cell set. If 'global file time', you can define as many epochs as you want, with 0 corresponding to start time of the first cell set. If 'local file time', you can define as many epochs as you want per input cell set, with 0 corresponding to start time of each cell set.

params.name: Epochs
params.description: Tuples of the start and end times (in seconds) for each epoch (e.g., if 'Define Epochs by' is set to 'Global file time', (0, 600), (650, 950), (950, 1250)). If 'Define Epochs by' is set to 'Local file time', provide one list of tuples per input cell set file (e.g., [(0, 600)], [(0, 300), (300, 600)]). If 'Define Epochs by' is set to 'Files', you can leave this parameter empty.

params.name: Epoch Names
params.description: Comma-separated list of time epoch names (e.g., 'baseline, training, test')

params.name: Epoch Colors
params.description: Comma-separated list of colors for epochs (e.g., 'lightgray, lightblue, lightgreen')

params.name: State Column Name
params.description: Name of the column in annotations file containing state information

params.name: State Names
params.description: Comma-separated list of behavioral state names (e.g., 'rest, active, exploration')

params.name: State Colors
params.description: Comma-separated list of colors for states (e.g., 'gray, blue, green')

params.name: Method to Compare States
params.description: Specifies how states are compared; this tool currently supports only state vs baseline comparisons.

params.name: Correlation Statistic
params.description: Per-cell correlation statistic to summarize in distribution previews (max, min, or mean).

params.name: Define Epochs By
params.description: Method to define epochs. If 'files', one epoch per input cell set will be automatically defined, for the whole duration of each cell set. If 'global file time', you can define as many epochs as you want, with 0 corresponding to start time of the first cell set. If 'local file time', you can define as many epochs as you want per input cell set, with 0 corresponding to start time of each cell set.

params.name: Epochs
params.description: Tuples of the start and end times (in seconds) for each epoch (e.g., if 'Define Epochs by' is set to 'Global file time', (0, 600), (650, 950), (950, 1250)). If 'Define Epochs by' is set to 'Local file time', provide one list of tuple per input cell set file (e.g., [(0, 600)], [(0, 300), (300, 600)]). If 'Define Epochs by' is set to 'Files', you can leave this parameter empty.

params.name: Baseline State
params.description: State to use as baseline for modulation calculations

params.name: Baseline Epoch
params.description: Epoch to use as baseline for modulation calculations

params.name: Concatenate Files
params.description: Whether to concatenate multiple input files

params.name: Trace Scaling Method
params.description: Method for scaling trace data. Baseline methods require baseline_state to be specified.

params.name: Event Scaling Method
params.description: Method for scaling event data. Baseline methods require baseline_state to be specified.

params.name: Event Correlation Previews
params.description: Attach event-based correlation previews to the outputs when event data and correlations are available.

params.name: Tolerance
params.description: Tolerance for temporal alignment and file concatenation

params.name: Sort by Time
params.description: Whether to sort cell sets by time when concatenating

params.name: Significance Level
params.description: Significance level for statistical tests

params.name: Number of Shuffles
params.description: Number of shuffles for permutation tests

results.name: Activity Per State-Epoch Data
results.description: CSV file with activity metrics for each cell in each state-epoch combination

results.name: Correlations Per State-Epoch Data
results.description: CSV file with correlation statistics for each state-epoch combination

results.name: Modulation vs Baseline Data
results.description: CSV file with modulation indices relative to baseline

results.name: Average Correlations
results.description: Average positive and negative correlations for each state-epoch combination

results.name: Pairwise Correlation Heatmaps
results.description: Raw correlation matrices for each state-epoch combination stored in HDF5 format

results.name: Spatial Analysis of Pairwise Correlations
results.description: Raw correlation matrices and cell pair correlations with spatial position information for each cell pair across state-epoch combinations

description: Combined analysis of neural activity and correlations across behavioral states and time epochs with baseline comparison
